name: AdultPsychosocialDistressAssessment
title: Adult Psychosocial Distress Assessment
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent is to capture that a psychosocial distress assessment is completed.),(Data Element Scope: Maps to the Assessment category of the QDM.),(Inclusion Criteria: Psychosocial distress assessment),(Exclusion Criteria: Anything that does not meet inclusion criteria)
